alert.note: Alert for Bay; Midland; Saginaw; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Tuscola, southern Bay, Saginaw and southern Midland Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Essexville to near Freeland to Merrill. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Essexville around 405 PM EDT. Munger around 415 PM EDT. Bridgeport and Marion Springs around 425 PM EDT. St. Charles and Reese around 430 PM EDT. Frankenmuth, Vassar, Chesaning and Oakley around 450 PM EDT. Birch Run and Millington around 500 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Carrollton, Garfield, Arthur, Fenmore, Buena Vista Township, Gera, Gilford, Indiantown, Hemlock and Porter Township. People attending Bavarian Festival, Frankenmuth Funtown Chowdown Food Truck Festival, and Party on McCarty should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
